summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Plat 40W, page 110 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property at 700 Union Street from Downtown Office Core 2 (DOC/2) to Downtown Office Core 1 (DOC/1) and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of the Washington State Convention and Trade Center, a public non-profit corporation, c/o Jerome L. Hillis, agent, C.F. 295976.)
